review: I just installed my Fire TV.  Took all of 10 minutes - most of which was unboxing the components.  Plugged cables in, plugged power supply in and started using it.  Wish other things were as simple.  I played around with voice input and am pleasantly surprised at how well it works.  This stuff is becoming easier and easier to use (I'm from the "get up to change channel age").  Because of a recently deceased Smart TV I'm using a (non) Smart box.  No problem.  I'm using a hard-wired 'Net connection and will update this when I go to WI-FI if there are any issues.I really like the ability to switch between Fire and Cable just by changing the input source of the TV (HDMI 1 to HDMI 2).  No time lag at all.
author: J. Pryvarski "John P."
